questionTitle: There <u><font color='red'>is</font></u> <u><font color='red'>twenty four</font></u> <u><font color='red'>hours</font></u> <u><font color='red'>in</font></u> a day.
<u><font color='red'>Whose</font></u> <u><font color='red'>the</font></u> hat is <u><font color='red'>this</font></u>? It's <u><font color='red'>Mary's</font></u>.
<u><font color='red'>Uncle Ho's</font></u> birthday <u><font color='red'>is</font></u> <u><font color='red'>in</font></u> 19th <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> May.
<u><font color='red'>Let's</font></u> <u><font color='red'>going</font></u> to <u><font color='red'>the dancing hall</font></u> <u><font color='red'>this</font></u> Sunday.
